tool_description: Information about planned orbital missions from spaceports around the world
name: Space Launch
title: Space Launch

api_list.name: Get All Planned Launches
api_list.description: Returns an array of objects containing all planned spaceport launches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://space-launch.p.rapidapi.com/launches/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-launch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://space-launch.p.rapidapi.com/launches/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-launch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Planned Launches By Spacecraft
api_list.description:
Returns an array of objects containing planned spaceport launches for specified spacecraft.

Case sensitive parameter, please provide multi word rockets with each word capitalised.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://space-launch.p.rapidapi.com/rockets/Falcon Heavy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-launch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://space-launch.p.rapidapi.com/rockets/{rocket}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-launch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Planned Launches By Country/State
api_list.description:
Returns an array of objects containing planned spaceport launches for specified location.

For US locations, please send location parameter as state only.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://space-launch.p.rapidapi.com/locations/Florida"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-launch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://space-launch.p.rapidapi.com/locations/{location}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-launch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
